channel.title: Is this possible? - will rep++ if the answer work!
channel.description: it is possible to make a .class file to a .java files, but still have it as .class same that u have the .java file in the client? like it is client.class and client.java

item.title: Is this possible? - will rep++ if the answer work!
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

I have tried it on all my files in both the source and client and it has worked 100%. May not for all i guess but for me it did.
EDIT: I checked the link you gave him and it looks nothing like DJ Java Decompiler. All you have to do is open the .class file and it will make it a .java file well after you save it as one but still.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this possible? - will rep++ if the answer work!
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“neroxx, post:13, topic:421616”]with the de-compiler thing i put the jframe.class in it and get this behing it:

[code]import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Component;
import java.awt.Container;
import java.awt.Desktop;
import java.awt.Dimension;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import java.io.PrintStream;
import java.net.InetAddress;
import java.net.URI;
import java.net.URL;
import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JMenu;
import javax.swing.JMenuBar;
import javax.swing.JMenuItem;
import javax.swing.JPanel;
import javax.swing.JPopupMenu;
import javax.swing.UIManager;
import sign.signlink;

public class Jframe extends client
implements ActionListener
{
private static JMenuItem menuItem;
private JFrame frame;

public Jframe(String[] paramArrayOfString)
{
try
{
signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(server));
initUI();
} catch (Exception localException) {
localException.printStackTrace();
}
}

public void initUI() {
try {
UIManager.setLookAndFeel(UIManager.getSystemLookAndFeelClassName());
JPopupMenu.setDefaultLightWeightPopupEnabled(false);
this.frame = new JFrame(“Casterz Official Client”);
this.frame.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
this.frame.setResizable(false);
this.frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(3);
JPanel localJPanel = new JPanel();

  localJPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
  localJPanel.add(this);
  localJPanel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(765, 503));

  JMenu localJMenu = new JMenu("       Forums  |  Vote  |  Donate       ");

  String[] arrayOfString = { "Forums", "Vote", "Donate", "-", "Exit" };

  for (String str : arrayOfString) {
    JMenuItem localJMenuItem = new JMenuItem(str);
    if (str.equalsIgnoreCase("-")) {
      localJMenu.addSeparator();
    } else {
      localJMenuItem.addActionListener(this);
      localJMenu.add(localJMenuItem);
    }
  }

  ??? = new JMenuBar();
  JMenuBar localJMenuBar = new JMenuBar();

  this.frame.add(localJMenuBar);
  ((JMenuBar)???).add(localJMenu);
  this.frame.getContentPane().add((Component)???, "North");
  this.frame.getContentPane().add(localJPanel, "Center");
  this.frame.pack();

  this.frame.setVisible(true);
  this.frame.setResizable(false);

  init();
} catch (Exception localException) {
  localException.printStackTrace();
}

}

public URL getCodeBase() {
try {
return new URL(“http://” + server + “/cache”); } catch (Exception localException) {
}
return super.getCodeBase();
}

public URL getDocumentBase()
{
return getCodeBase();
}

public void loadError(String paramString) {
System.out.println("loadError: " + paramString);
}

public String getParameter(String paramString) {
return “”;
}

private static void openUpWebSite(String paramString) {
Desktop localDesktop = Desktop.getDesktop();
try {
localDesktop.browse(new URI(paramString));
} catch (Exception localException) {
}
}

public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent paramActionEvent) {
String str = paramActionEvent.getActionCommand();
try {
if (str != null) {
if (str.equalsIgnoreCase(“Exit”)) {
System.exit(0);
}
if (str.equalsIgnoreCase(“vote”)) {
openUpWebSite(“http://www.mmorpgtoplist.com/in.php?site=32729”);
}
if (str.equalsIgnoreCase(“donate”)) {
openUpWebSite(“http://s4.zetaboards.com/casterz/pages/001/”);
}
if (str.equalsIgnoreCase(“forums”))
openUpWebSite(“http://s4.zetaboards.com/Casterz/site/”);
}
}
catch (Exception localException)
{
}
}
}[/code]

i copied that and added it in the files as jframe.java but when i compiled, i got errors :S[/quote]

Obviously, decompilers don’t work perfectly. You’re lucky the code hasn’t been obbed.

Or make your own JFrame.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx
item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

with the de-compiler thing i put the jframe.class in it and get this behing it:

[code]import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Component;
import java.awt.Container;
import java.awt.Desktop;
import java.awt.Dimension;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import java.io.PrintStream;
import java.net.InetAddress;
import java.net.URI;
import java.net.URL;
import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JMenu;
import javax.swing.JMenuBar;
import javax.swing.JMenuItem;
import javax.swing.JPanel;
import javax.swing.JPopupMenu;
import javax.swing.UIManager;
import sign.signlink;

public class Jframe extends client
implements ActionListener
{
private static JMenuItem menuItem;
private JFrame frame;

public Jframe(String[] paramArrayOfString)
{
try
{
signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(server));
initUI();
} catch (Exception localException) {
localException.printStackTrace();
}
}

public void initUI() {
try {
UIManager.setLookAndFeel(UIManager.getSystemLookAndFeelClassName());
JPopupMenu.setDefaultLightWeightPopupEnabled(false);
this.frame = new JFrame(“Casterz Official Client”);
this.frame.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
this.frame.setResizable(false);
this.frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(3);
JPanel localJPanel = new JPanel();

  localJPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
  localJPanel.add(this);
  localJPanel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(765, 503));

  JMenu localJMenu = new JMenu("       Forums  |  Vote  |  Donate       ");

  String[] arrayOfString = { "Forums", "Vote", "Donate", "-", "Exit" };

  for (String str : arrayOfString) {
    JMenuItem localJMenuItem = new JMenuItem(str);
    if (str.equalsIgnoreCase("-")) {
      localJMenu.addSeparator();
    } else {
      localJMenuItem.addActionListener(this);
      localJMenu.add(localJMenuItem);
    }
  }

  ??? = new JMenuBar();
  JMenuBar localJMenuBar = new JMenuBar();

  this.frame.add(localJMenuBar);
  ((JMenuBar)???).add(localJMenu);
  this.frame.getContentPane().add((Component)???, "North");
  this.frame.getContentPane().add(localJPanel, "Center");
  this.frame.pack();

  this.frame.setVisible(true);
  this.frame.setResizable(false);

  init();
} catch (Exception localException) {
  localException.printStackTrace();
}

}

public URL getCodeBase() {
try {
return new URL(“http://” + server + “/cache”); } catch (Exception localException) {
}
return super.getCodeBase();
}

public URL getDocumentBase()
{
return getCodeBase();
}

public void loadError(String paramString) {
System.out.println("loadError: " + paramString);
}

public String getParameter(String paramString) {
return “”;
}

private static void openUpWebSite(String paramString) {
Desktop localDesktop = Desktop.getDesktop();
try {
localDesktop.browse(new URI(paramString));
} catch (Exception localException) {
}
}

public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent paramActionEvent) {
String str = paramActionEvent.getActionCommand();
try {
if (str != null) {
if (str.equalsIgnoreCase(“Exit”)) {
System.exit(0);
}
if (str.equalsIgnoreCase(“vote”)) {
openUpWebSite(“http://www.mmorpgtoplist.com/in.php?site=32729”);
}
if (str.equalsIgnoreCase(“donate”)) {
openUpWebSite(“http://s4.zetaboards.com/casterz/pages/001/”);
}
if (str.equalsIgnoreCase(“forums”))
openUpWebSite(“http://s4.zetaboards.com/Casterz/site/”);
}
}
catch (Exception localException)
{
}
}
}[/code]

i copied that and added it in the files as jframe.java but when i compiled, i got errors :S
